comments.body: I initially thought we could use something like this: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/52817922/typescript-return-type-depending-on-parameter but since when `options.return` is `true` you can have the same type as when `options.return` is false or a `Boom` object, it doesn't work. You'd have the same problem as you mentioned in your comments.

Yep, I tried all sorts of solutions before going with the `any` but even if i did `false | Boom` and hard casted to Boom on the receiving end it still was very unhappy, so we get the `any`. I'm glad the comments explained the reasoning well enough.
